official-title.#text: To provide for the conveyance of National Forest System land in the State of Louisiana.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
finds it in the public interest to authorize the sale of certain federally owned land in
			 the Kisatchie National Forest in Louisiana for market value consideration.

quote.#tail:
means Collins Camp Properties, Incorporated, a corporation existing under the laws of the State of
			 Louisiana.

All federally owned lands within section 9, Township 10 North, Range 5 West, in Winn Parish,
			 Louisiana.

			 Range 5 West, Winn Parish, Louisiana, as more specifically depicted on a
			 certificate of survey dated March 7, 2007, by Glen L. Cannon, P.L.S. 4436.

shall sell and quitclaim to said

text.#text:
Land sales authorized by this Act shall be for cash consideration equal to the market value of the
			 land.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
and done in conformity with the Uniform Appraisal Standards
			 for Federal Land Acquisitions; or, if sold by means other than that
			 provided in

, market value may be determined by competitive
			 sale.

text.#text:
The market value of the land sold under this Act shall be as determined by an appraisal approved by
			 the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall meet disclosure requirements
			 for hazardous substances, but shall otherwise not be required to remediate
			 or abate those substances.

header.#text: Proceeds from the sale of land

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
for the sale of land under this Act shall be deposited
			 into the account in the Treasury of the United States established by

until expended,
			 without further appropriation, for the acquisition of lands and interests
			 in land in the Kisatchie National Forest in Louisiana.

shall require the Collins Camp Properties to pay at closing the reasonable costs of

special use authorizations agreeing to relinquish their
			 authorizations upon a sale to Collins Camp Properties. For any holder not

			 terms until the date of expiration.
